attributes.action: force camalot to pay out "all" money collected each week(in the prize fund) to the people who are nearest winning,eg if nobody has six numbers then share it out to the others ,so that none of us have to pay for another ticket to win a pot that we have allready contributed to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There is an independent commission for lottery.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
